org.restlet.security
Class Realm

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.security.Realm
Direct Known Subclasses:
MemoryRealm
public abstract class Realm
extends Object

Security realm capable of providing an enroler and a verifier.

Author:
Jerome Louvel
